choice.rationale: This table provides net sales by reportable segments North America, International, and AWS for the latest fiscal years 2023 and 2024, with clear revenue totals and year-over-year growth percentages. It is from Item 8 / Notes to Financial Statements as indicated in the nearby text, matching the request for segment revenue data.

layout.notes: Row labels in first column; fiscal years 2023 and 2024 in columns 3 and 9 respectively; header rows 1 and 2 contain year info; units in millions.
